E

Evaluate - Class in BillboardServer
 
Evaluate() - Constructor for class BillboardServer.Evaluate
 
EvaluateCreateEditBillboard(Connection, Billboard) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and Billboard object as parameters, inserts billboard into database
EvaluateCreateUser(Connection, CreateUserRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes db connection and Create User Request as parameters - inserts the new user and creates the permissions
EvaluateCurrentBillboard(Connection) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a database connection as a parameter - returns either the currently scheduled billboard or the placeholder file
EvaluateDeleteBillboard(Connection, String) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and String billboard name as parameters and deletes the schedules associated with the billboard then deletes the billboard.
EvaluateDeleteUser(Connection, DeleteUserRequest, String) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection, delete user request and requesting user as parameters Updates any existing billboards and schedules that were created by the deleted user and changes the created by field to the deleting user Then deletes user permissions associated with the user and then deletes the user
EvaluateGetBillboard(Connection, String) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes db connection and billboard name as parameters - returns all billboard information if billboard exists - otherwise error
EvaluateGetPermissions(Connection, GetUserPermissionsRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and get permissions request and returns a list of strings of the users permissions
EvaluateListBillboards(Connection) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes db connection as parameter - returns a list of names and creators of all billboards in the database
EvaluateListUsers(Connection) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and returns a list of usernames and how many billboards a user has created
EvaluateLogin(Connection, LoginRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes LoginRequest and db connection as parameters - checks if username and password match a user and if so returns a session token - else returns error
EvaluateRemoveFromSchedule(Connection, RemoveFromScheduleRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and remove schedule request, then deletes from the schedule based on billboard name and schedule time
evaluateRequest(Request, Connection) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Server
Method for evaluating requests - takes a Request object (from the ObjectInputStream) and a database connection and evaluates the request according to its type.
EvaluateScheduleBillboard(Connection, ScheduleBillboardRequest, String) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes db connection and schedule properties as parameters - inserts schedule into database
EvaluateSetUserPassword(Connection, SetUserPasswordRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and set password request, then gets the salted hash of the provided password and updates the users details
EvaluateSetUserPermissions(Connection, SetUserPermissionsRequest) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes a db connection and set user permissions request as parameters Deletes existing permissions then inserts new ones into database
EvaluateViewSchedule(Connection) - Static method in class BillboardServer.Evaluate
Takes db connection as parameter, returns all scheduled billboards for the next 7 days
